title: Read below
body:
I'm clicking on the league shortcut which would take me to the launch screen but when I click on the shortcut nothing happens. 

(Right after 6.14 release)

replies.body: Restart your computer and attempt to launch the game again.

If after restarting you still see the issue, it's likely caused by improper system permissions. League works with a lot of files outside of the installation folder, so I recommend trying our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to resolve the issue.

Let me know if this helped.
